Inspired by this conversation, I ran a coverage tool on a to=
y project
of mine last night. The coverage in one package had dropped from =
99%
to 83% in a few days. I extracted a common superclass to eliminate the
=
duplication. Coverage happy again.

Just because coverage can be misused, d=
oesn't make it useless.
